      Constructor parameters in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rsgroup with type arguments of type Address 
      Constructor and Description
      RSGroupInfo(String name, Set<Address> servers) 
      RSGroupInfo(String name, Set<Address> servers, Set<TableName> tables)
      Deprecated. 
      Since 3.0.0, will be removed in 4.0.0. The rsgroup information for a table will be stored in the configuration of a table so this will be removed.
